channel.title: VPS on whonix workstation
channel.description:
Is it possible to tunnel a VPS RDP connection in whonix? My idea is to install an RDP software under whonix workstation and then use the VPS. This connection will be tunneled though TOR ( as using whonix gateway), correct?
So it will be:
TOR > RDP > Windows on VPS

item.title: VPS on whonix workstation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Itâ€™s possible when using TCP. (Tor does not support UDP.) Rather use VNC and encryption/authentication. Tunnel through OpenVPN (TCP mode) or so.

Read full topic
